Posted By: holgir (8/6/2009 4:04:51 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: If you want to build a deck around her, use [Vedalken AEthermage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vedalken AEthermage) to tutor her. [Tortured Existence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tortured Existence) allows you to return the Linessa copies back to your hand for {B} to maximize utilizing her *Grandeur* ability (Tortured Existence lets you do so at instant speed as well, effectively making it a mana sink)
posts.html:
If you want to build a deck around her, use Vedalken AEthermage to tutor her. Tortured Existence allows you to return the Linessa copies back to your hand for {B} to maximize utilizing her Grandeur ability (Tortured Existence lets you do so at instant speed as well, effectively making it a mana sink)

Posted By: tcollins (1/6/2011 4:19:23 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
[Pack Hunt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pack Hunt) on this is really mean. (Pack Hunt is mean on all of the cards with grandeur but this seems the most crippling, setting your opponent back 3 land drops and up to 3 creatures/enchantments/artifacts  
  
Whatever creature your opponent plays after that, you can bounce back with her first ability. Yay.  
  
Also, [Oversold Cemetery](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oversold Cemetery) + this is a nice soft lock. You play [Sakura-Tribe Elder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sakura-Tribe Elder) etc. for manafixing anyway. Filling your graveyard with four creatures shouldn't be a problem even if your opponent doesn't 'help'.
posts.html:

Whatever creature your opponent plays after that, you can bounce back with her first ability. Yay.

Also, Oversold Cemetery + this is a nice soft lock. You play Sakura-Tribe Elder etc. for manafixing anyway. Filling your graveyard with four creatures shouldn't be a problem even if your opponent doesn't 'help'.

posts.post_content: Interesting card. Her first ability isn't all that great; its just a really expensive Unsummon. posts.post_content: @Nagazel Library of Leng only affects cards discarded by effects to be put on top of your library. Linessa's Grandeur ability requires you to discard as a cost to activate it (Cost ≠ Effects). So no awesome Leng shenanigans.
posts.html:
@Nagazel Library of Leng only affects cards discarded by effects to be put on top of your library. Linessa's Grandeur ability requires you to discard as a cost to activate it (Cost ≠ Effects). So no awesome Leng shenanigans.
